verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Oh come let's sing, let us rejoice
Oh come let's sing, let us rejoice
Messiah's come, and He brought life
And He put laughter into my soul!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
It would've been enough if He brought Peace
It would've been enough if He brought Love
It would've been enough if He brought Life
But He put laughter in my soul!
